Andrii Sakhnovskyi

I became interested in web-design about a year ago because I have a lot of friends in IT. I graduated from the Beetroot Academy in 2019 in the direction of web development. I studied at the Udemy and learn.javascript courses. Now I'm doing it for myself, I want to get practice on a real project, try to work in a team. I want to improve my knowledge and ready to learn new things and work with frameworks. I am fond of animation, tried to work in View.js. I made up sites for friends and colleagues. Ready to work remotely or in the office.
I'm 31. I have a wonderful family and daughter. I like outdoor activities and spending time with my family.

Skills

  • Skills in the valid cross-browser markup of website templates and landing page from .PSD to HTML and CSS using Adobe Photoshop to creating layouts.
  • Experience in implementing of responsive design for the layout at any screen resolution of different types of devices without using any frameworks or grid systems.
  • Using modern tools for automating Front-End Development: Gulp, SASS, PUG.
  • Experience in using CSS-animation
  • Experience in work with version control system Git.

Technical skills

  • Markup language:HTML5
  • Stylesheet language:CSS3
  • Programming language: JavaScript(ES5/ES6)
  • JavaScript library: JQuery
  • CSS-framework: Bootstrap4
  • CSS-preprocessor: SASS
  • Other: AJAX, JSON, VueJS, BEM, Gulp, Git, PUG, Adaptive/Responsive/Pixel-Perfect design, Adobe Photoshop, Figma, VS Code.

Education

  • Chernihiv National Technical University Specialty: Machine Building 2004-2009
  • Beetroot academy 2018-2019
  • learn.javascript.ru, udemy.com, htmlacademy.ru
  • English – Pre-Intermediate
  • Polish – Elementary
